radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased functional connectivity between the medial prefrontal cortex and superior frontal gyrus at baseline; significant differences in connectivity between the patient's measurements and those of a depression control group.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased coupling between the DMN and the frontal pole 200 minutes after infusion; differences were no longer detectable 200 minutes and 1 day after ketamine infusion, but altered SAN-precuneus connectivity was evident again after 7 days.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Significantly decreased expression of serotonin (5-HT2A) receptors throughout the patient's brain.
